snippet: In their bid to become the new face of polygamy, Kody Brown, his four wives and their 17 children, who once fought penury, have turned their cause into a minor industry.
abstract: Family of Kody Brown, with his four wives and their 17 children, hopes to become the new face of polygamy; Browns have invited TLC television cameras into their Las Vegas homes for the reality show Sister Wives and have written a best-selling book about their lives, turning their cause into a minor industry.
lead_paragraph: In their bid to become the new face of polygamy, Kody Brown, his four wives and their 17 children, who once fought penury, have turned their cause into a minor industry.

headline.main: Polygamy as Lifestyle Choice, and a Reality TV Brand
headline.print_headline: Polygamy as a Lifestyle Choice, And a Reality TV Brand Name
